column4: What happens if a storm nocks my power out, does it recover well?
Is there any faster way to get cd's?  I'm kind of impatient.
I have dialup.
Not really, I live in area where I hate every one.  Don't ask.
I've only lived here for about 5 years.
I ordered some last night.
I guess I can wait for it.  The quality of the cd's will be better then burned cd's.  I noticed cd-r's tend to scratch easy and don't last as long.
I was just on there site and it said October.
I guess I better get downloading, I'll still get the cd's in the mail any way.
Is it just one cd iso?  Because that should take about oh 3 days on dialup.
yer gonna get the cds in the mail before you finish downloading the install iso then installing the rest of the os from thenet
I live in Dallas... maybe we can work something out
What do you have in mind?
thats what my laptop is
that sounds like a dell
look up your local LUG, linux users group
thats not a big deal
i think you can find a better laptop for around the same money dude
you can get, for example, a completely refurbished or new dell 1 gig laptop for under 500\
you live near one of the best dell outlet stores on the planet
that one would be perfect for you
